# Create Neural Link Documentation

Create a comprehensive guide for the Neural Link MCP server in `learn/guides/mcp/NeuralLink.md`.
The guide should cover:
- Architecture overview (Bridge, Client, Server)
- Key capabilities (Introspection, Control, Visual Debugging)
- Installation and Setup (Client-side config, MCP config)
- Usage examples
- Deep dive into the implementation based on `ai/mcp/server/neural-link` and `src/ai`
- Reference the `toJSON` protocol and its importance.
- Explain the security model (localhost only).
